Skill.label: D:18+ Arc (Cast within Orb of Storms for more dmg)
Aura:16+ Herald of Ice & Summon Skitterbots
Utility: Frost bomb + Orb of Storms
Vaal Cold Snap (Shaper Helm or Delirium Gloves)
Weapon setup with (Trigger socket spell craft)

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
GEMS - ACT - NPC - QUEST
-------Leveling Orb of Storms--------
A: 1 - 4 Freezing Pulse Freezing Pulse - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate Arcane Surge support - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate Onslaught support - This can be Muled on a Scion
B: 1+ Stormblast Mine Stormblast Mine - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate
A: 4 - 10+ Frost Bomb Frost Bomb - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Arcane Surge support - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate Onslaught support - This can be Muled on a Scion
M: 4 - 10 Frostblink Frostblink - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs
M: 10+ Flame Dash Flame Dash - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged brute Arcane Surge support - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate Smoke Mine - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged brute
A: 12+ Orb of Storms Orb of Storms - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Onslaught support - This can be Muled on a Scion Added lightning damage - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged brute
D: 12+ Arc Arc - Act 1 - Nessa - The Siren's Cadence
D: 18+ Arc Arc - Act 1 - Nessa - The Siren's Cadence Added lightning damage - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged brute Faster Casting support - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel
Aura: Herald of ice and Summon Skitterbots Herald of Ice - Act 2 - Yeena - The Root of the Problem Summon Skitterbots - Act 2 - Yeena - The Root of the Problem
Curse: 24+ F Conductivity - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love
C: Lightning Spire Trap (Single Target) Lightning Spire Trap - Act 3 - Clarissa - Sever the Right Hand Elemental Focus - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel Controlled Destruction - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel Trap and Mine Damage support - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel
Aura: 31+ Summon Skitterbots + Blasphemy Enfeeble Summon Skitterbots - Act 2 - Yeena - The Root of the Problem Blasphemy - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Enfeeble - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love
TIP - Enfeeble is a defensive curse but if you feel safe you can switch out Enfeeble for an offensive curse. For example - Elemental Weakness - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love
A: 38+ Orb of Storms Orb of Storms - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Chain support - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Elemental Proliferation support - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission Ice Bite - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate
D: CWDT Steelskin Cast When Damage Taken - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Steelskin - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking Some Eggs Increased Duration support - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate
---------Vortex Swap----------
Vortex Vortex - Act 3 - Clarissa - Sever the Right Hand Elemental Focus - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel Efficacy - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Hypothermia - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate
Cold Snap Vaal Cold Snap - Act 2 - Yeena - The Root of the Problem (Need Vaal orbs for Vaal Cold Snap) Elemental Focus - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel Efficacy - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Bone Chill - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare
Movement Flame Dash - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged brute Arcane Surge support - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate Smoke Mine - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged brute
Utility Frost Bomb - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Orb of Storms - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs
Auras Blasphemy - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Enfeeble - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love Malevolence - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love
Defensive Cast When Damage Taken - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Steelskin - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking Some Eggs Increased Duration support - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate
TIP - You can switch as early as 38 once you have links for Vortex and Coldsnap with Normal Labyrinth complete, but you definently should switch after Cruel Labyrinth.
---------Vortex Endgame----------
Vortex Vortex - Act 3 - Clarissa - Sever the Right Hand Elemental Focus - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel Efficacy - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Hypothermia - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Controlled Destruction - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel Swift Affliction - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate
Cold Snap Vaal Cold Snap - Act 2 - Yeena - The Root of the Problem (Need Vaal orbs for Vaal Cold Snap) Elemental Focus - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel Efficacy - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Bone Chill - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare
Movement 1 Flame Dash - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged brute Arcane Surge support - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate
Curse Blasphemy - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Enfeeble - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love
Movement 2 Shield Charge - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Faster Attacks support - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate Fortify support - Act 3 - Siosa - A Fixture of Fate
Auras Summon Skitterbots - Act 2 - Yeena - The Root of the Problem Vaal Discipline - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love (Need Vaal orbs for Vaal Discipline) Enlighten 3-4 (Drop only) Chaos Golem - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - Breaking the Seal (Optional, can put anything you want in this extra slot)
NOTE: Need Enlighten 3-4 to fit in all the auras, without Enlighten you can use a 25% Aura instead. For example - Flesh and Stone for blind aura in sand stance, Herald of Ash for more AoE or Arctic Armor for more survivability.
